resources.string: Set your preferences for the options given below
Enter the prompt text for using gemini.
"Describe the image and list items present in the image.

Tap on the button above to reset settings to their original defaults.\nNote : When Restore defaults settings is pressed Face Detection Settings will be not be reset.You need to manually delete the familiar faces in Face Detection settings.
You are not connected to Smart Cap.Please connect to it and try again.
This app is for visually Impaired/Challenged individuals.There are 5 features in this app namely.

Connection to Smart cap is Successful.
There are no familiar faces added as of now. Please click on the ADD NEW FACE button at the bottom to add a familiar face.

The prompt text should not be empty. Please enter a prompt text or use the default prompt text.
Summarize the following text content in 150words.
Enter prompt text to summarize the document.
1. Set prompt text below to summarize your pdf document.
2. Pick a pdf file from your device to summarize it.
Document summary has been generated and it will be announced after a beep.
Follow the steps given below to summarize your pdf document.
Note : This feature is coming soon.(At the moment you can only get value of Barcodes/QR-codes but not its corresponding product details.

Product Info is given below

Unable to find product in our database.

string-array.name: feature_description
string-array.item: 1. Reading mode - Use this option to recognize text by placing the phone\'s camera over a sheet containing text.
2. Summarize Docs - Use this feature to summarize pdf documents.
3. Detect Objects - Use this feature to detect objects using the camera module on the smart cap.
4. Detect Faces - Use this feature to detect faces and recognize familiar faces using the camera module on the smart cap.
5. Scan Products - Use this feature to get details of a product(like its Cost, Expiry date, Mfg date etc.) by scanning the QR-code or Barcode available on it.
